ja395:3.4: kaṇṭhe kiṇikiṇāyati → kaṇṭhe kiṇakiṇāyati (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kaṇṭhe kiṃnikilāyati (sya1ed, sya2ed); idaṃ kaṇṭhe kiṇāyati (mr)
ja395:7.2: Kharaputtavaggo → senakavaggo (bj, pts-vp-pli1); khuraputtavaggo (sya1ed, sya2ed); sūcivaggo (mr)
ja395:11.3: kharo ca → senako (bj); sūci ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
